name: Poly Fantasy
description:
A story of war and honor, melee and magic; an adventure of blood, glory and valor; all staged in a unique low-poly style world, join us today and save the world!
For thousand of cycles, the Order of Legend have been the protectors of peace and justice in the Kingdom.
Rising from the ashes of the last Great War, comes the Lord of Chaos, the terror from a perished civilization, the enemy of the world. With an army of monsters, witches and dragons at his disposal, the Lord of Chaos will crumble the entire kingdom.
Summon heroes, monsters and angels across the world, and repel the evil. As the leader, it is your duty to stand against the tide of darkness, to summon your heroes and guide them in the fight for the future of the land.

“The style of polygons”
Unique polygonal character design, combine the cartoon style perfectly with the character & scenes in the game. How will polygonal heroes create a new era under your leadership in the magical world?

“A land of fantasy”
The fantastic continent is full of opportunities and challenges. The lords recruit heroes from each camp and lead them to meet the challenge of the unknown. Only the most powerful Lord can stand undefeated.

“Laborsaving way of combat”
Appoint your hero squad, and they will automatically fight for you! Just wait and get rich resources, players can get rewards even offline.

“Strong strategy Gameplay”
More than one hundred heroes from different factions, four different types of weapon options, changeable strategic formation match, unique hero skills. Simple operation, lots of fun.
